DOC.brief_summary: This study compare two different kind splint patient surgical contracture release dupuytren 's disease . It compare static splint dynamic splint .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old male females Dupuytren 's contracture patient contracture less 30 degree MCP contraction contraction IP joint previous surgical treatment Dupuytren 's contracture MCP great 30 degree contraindication dynamic splint ( upper limb amputee , paresis , ect . )
